org.sql: SELECT user_id FROM roles INNER JOIN member_roles ON member_roles.role_id = roles.id INNER JOIN members ON members.id = member_roles.member_id LEFT OUTER JOIN role_permissions ON role_permissions.role_id = roles.id WHERE roles.builtin = "$1" AND roles.type = "$2" AND roles.id = "$3" ORDER BY position

rewrites.sql: SELECT user_id FROM roles INNER JOIN member_roles ON member_roles.role_id = roles.id INNER JOIN members ON members.id = member_roles.member_id WHERE roles.builtin = "$1" AND roles.type = "$2" AND roles.id = "$3" ORDER BY position
